InfiniteMovesOnPerimeterBehaviour - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.cards.behaviours.moveBehaviours
This class implements Triton's behaviour that permits to move workers infinite times when the worker moves on a perimeter position.

initState() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.gameStates.MoveState
This method initialises the turn by calling methods that : - find the current player of the game; - send a message to all the other players (different from the current) telling that they have to wait for their turn; - set all the workers as unmoved (flag set true if the worker is moved, to recognise it as build-allowed during the turn);
initState() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.gameStates.TurnState
This method initialises the turn of the game.
